activities: Broadnet Teleservices™ uses telephonic systems to dial phone numbers on lists submitted to us by our customers. These lists remain the property of the respective individual customers. A customer can permanently delete any list at any time.
personaldata: Customer’s names, addresses, telephone numbers, email addresses and any information that can be linked to a specific individual. No data is manually processed.  We have no applicable Human Resources Data.
recoursemech: With respect to any complaints relating to this Policy that cannot be resolved through our internal processes, we use the JAMS Safe Harbor dispute process, which can be found at http://www.jamsadr.com/safeharbor
